name: KIDMED_R3_SC
description: This table holds claim information from KIDMED REFERRAL 3 multiple response columns.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim information record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: KIDMED_R3_SC_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the suspected conditions for referral 3 in the claim information record.
